document.full_text: federal agents executed search warrants at several detroit area locations on tuesday including a medical marijuana facility owned by a businessman who also owns a long-closed auto plant that has become a symbol of detroit's decline.
document.title: agents raid medical marijuana offices near detroit
lines_and_colors: federal agents executed search warrants at several detroit area locations on tuesday including a medical marijuana facility owned by a businessman who also owns a long-closed auto plant that has become a symbol of detroit's decline.
